articles.title: U.S. boosters surge to all-time high on Omicron fears - Reuters
articles.description: Americans are lining up for booster doses of COVID-19 vaccines at a record pace, with concerns about the newly-detected Omicron coronavirus variant spurring millions to get shots, the U.S. government said on Tuesday.
